thread.title: Evernote, Dropbox, Flipboard, LinkedIn Figuring Out The Chinese Market
thread.title_full: Evernote, Dropbox, Flipboard, LinkedIn Figuring Out The Chinese Market

author: Expert
title: Evernote, Dropbox, Flipboard, LinkedIn Figuring Out The Chinese Market
text:
Worldnews Expert 
It’s becoming increasingly clear that a lot of valuable lessons have been learned by U.S. tech companies entering China. The early Chinese Internet era was all about a copy to China strategy for American brands — whatever worked in the U.S. surely would work in China. But it didn’t. In the first wave of the Chinese Internet starting about 10 […]
